content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Download the ultimate bundle of the best avant-garde games on PS4® from Sony’s Santa Monica Studio.

Journey
Soar above ruins and glide across sands as you explore an ancient world where life once flourished. With stunning visuals, haunting music and unique online gameplay, Journey delivers an experience like no other.

Flower
Take control of the wind as you explore beautiful and lush environments, interact with and change the environment as you go, and find balance and harmony in your surroundings.

The Unfinished Swan
Explore a mysterious all-white landscape by splatting paint to reveal the world around you. Each chapter brings surprises, new ways to explore the world, and encounters with the eccentric king who built this empire.

Bound
Repair a broken world through the beauty of dance. Experience a beautiful, fantastical world that exists in the mind of a woman revisiting the memories of her childhood. Use dance moves to traverse vast environments filled with platforming challenges.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

© 2012, 2015 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Journey is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. ©2008 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Flower is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Developed by thatgamecompany. © 2012 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. The Unfinished Swan is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Developed by Giant Sparrow. ©2016 Sony Interactive Entertainment America LLC. Developed by Plastic. Bound is a trademark of Sony Interactive Entertainment America LLC.
attributes.name: Avant-Garde Bundle
